WebLink.description:
If Standardized Event Name is utilized, compares registration over 12 weeks for This Year, Last Year, and 2 Years Ago.
Otherwise, compares the year to date registration count based on the number of days out from the event we are.
WebLink.url: /lightning/r/Report/{!IF( ISBLANK(Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c), "00O1O0000088cuuUAA", "00OJw00000A0pzFMAR" )}/view?fv0={!IF( ISBLANK(Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c), Events__c.Name, Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c )}&fv1={!IF( ISBLANK(Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c), Events__c.last_years_event__c, "False" )}&fv2={!IF( ISBLANK(Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c), Events__c.Days_Since_Last_Event__c, "Industry Attendee, Sponsor, Staff" )}
